list group everyone * -//...
read group * * -//app/.../core/build/deleteorgs.txt
=write group everyone * -//app/.../core/db/upgrade-scripts/...
=write group everyone * -//app/.../core/db/upgrade-scripts-sfsql/...
=write group everyone * -//app/.../core/db/sayonaradb/upgrade-scripts/...
=write group everyone * -//app/.../core/sfdc/config/sayonara_schema.xml
=write group everyone * -//app/.../core/db/plpgsql/...
=write group everyone * -//app/2*/*/core/schema-api/java/src/...
=write group everyone * -//app/2*/*/core/schema/submodules/...
=write group everyone * -//app/2*/*/core/udd-xml/java/resources/udd/udd-schema-catalog.xml
=write group everyone * -//app/2*/*/core/udd-xml/java/resources/udd/udd-custom-schema.xml
=write group everyone * -//app/2*/*/core/udd-xml/java/resources/udd/udd-picklist.xml
=write group everyone * -//app/2*/*/core/schema-catalog/java/src/...
=write group everyone * -//app/2*/*/core/sfdc/plsql/core/cCustomField*.sql
write group sdbschema * -//app/2*/*/core/sfdc/plsql/core/cCustomSchema*.sql
write group sdbschema * //app/*/*/core/db/upgrade-scripts-sfsql/...
write group sdbschema * //app/*/*/core/db/sayonaradb/upgrade-scripts/...
write group sdbschema * //app/*/*/core/sfdc/config/sayonara_schema.xml
write group sdbschema * //app/*/*/core/db/plpgsql/...
